1.title: The Conjugal Corpse

episode of.title: Flesh for the Beast: Tsukiko's Curse (TV Mini-Series 2013– )

1.plot: Paranormal explorers Parsons and Fortune are introduced to a highly sensitive psychic named Tsukiko by their mentor, Professor Wheatley. They quickly come to rely on Tsukiko's amazing skills as she helps out on a new assignment--conjuring the spirit of a mourning bride's dead fiancé to partake in a posthumous marriage ceremony and honeymoon! This is an opportunity for Tsukiko to display her dazzling, unsettling psychic abilities and prove her worth to Parsons and Fortune.

2.title: Blood Bath

episode of.title: Flesh for the Beast: Tsukiko's Curse (TV Mini-Series 2013– )

2.plot: A rash of blood-sucking activity is terrorizing a rural community and there's a reward to capture the vampires! When the team arrives to investigate, they face a demonic duo of sexy strippers who are seducing local boys and leaving them breathless. Tsukiko's knowledge of Japanese myths leads her to investigate a twisted cemetery tree and a mysterious Countess who may have something to do with the crimson-drenched crimes.

3.title: Devil's Bride

episode of.title: Flesh for the Beast: Tsukiko's Curse (TV Mini-Series 2013– )

3.plot: Professor Wheatley hires the team for a special mission to debunk a traveling exorcist, Byron Law, and his two sexy daughters. Tsukiko must fake demonic possession so Fortune and Parsons can document and debunk the unholy con man's modus operandi. Even Parsons and Fortune are unnerved when Tsukiko's performance becomes too chillingly convincing.

4.title: Jersey Devil Girl

episode of.title: Flesh for the Beast: Tsukiko's Curse (TV Mini-Series 2013– )

4.plot: Parsons investigates a satanic coven that claims to have discovered the buried remains of the infamous occultist Aleister Crowley, whom the cult is bent on resurrecting during a black mass. Traveling alone, Parsons picks up a seductive coven member who reveals herself to be a flesh-eating shape-shifter. The paranormal explorer's pleas for help go unheard as he falls captive to a violent dark force!

5.title: Ressurection Zone

episode of.title: Flesh for the Beast: Tsukiko's Curse (TV Mini-Series 2013– )

5.plot: Tsukiko and the team investigate a cemetery where the dead won't stay dead and buried. Tsukiko's surveillance leads to an old friend who has gained possession of the Necronomicon, a dangerous and dreaded occult grimoire. It's a book that Tsukiko has longed to obtain for herself and she must decide what personal price she is willing to pay to possess it and gain its forbidden knowledge.

6.title: Father Knows Beast

episode of.title: Flesh for the Beast: Tsukiko's Curse (TV Mini-Series 2013– )

6.plot: Tsukiko is close to unraveling the deep, dark secret to her psychic powers. She prepares for an epic occult ritual to confront and expel her inner demons and unintentionally takes Parsons and Fortune along for a fiery hell ride! When faced with a powerful demonic entity, can Tsukiko and her team handle the shocking, terrible truth?

imdb.plot outline: A trio of paranormal investigators explores the dark fringes of reality for self-knowledge, academic status and profit. The team consists of Tsukiko, a beautiful Japanese woman gifted with surprising psychic skills; Parsons, a skeptic and scientist obsessed with collecting data and documenting strange phenomena; and Fortune, a free spirit and new-age mystic who enjoys trippy, out-of-body experiences in search of cosmic truth. Each episode includes a rollercoaster ride of occult rituals, sex magic, black magic, bizarre antics and characters. Viewers will witness shape-shifters, blood-sucking, demons, blood-bathing, zombies, ghosts, astral travel and other eerie apparitions.
imdb.title: Flesh for the Beast: Tsukiko's Curse
